definitions.definition: An insect of the suborder Epiprocta or, more strictly, the infraorder Anisoptera , having four long transparent wings held perpendicular to a long body when perched.
examples: There were two dragonflies in the garden today.

main_definition: An insect of the suborder Epiprocta or, more strictly, the infraorder Anisoptera , having four long transparent wings held perpendicular to a long body when perched.
